name: BUREAU-BREAKING METHOD
description: Through ripples in the Essence of human connection, the Exalt may bring the wheels of government to a grinding halt by sabotaging a small portion of the bureaucracy. Spend 1 mote. The Exalt must spend a scene sabotaging a venture or bureaucratic task, using an Embassy roll if necessary. On success, this introduces a number of new obstacles on bureaucratic ventures equal to the Exalt’s Essence or successes on the roll (maximum five), whichever is higher. The Storyteller may decide this causes the venture to fail outright.

modes.name: Solar
modes.title: Indolent Official Charm
modes.effect: The Exalt may sabotage a venture just by speaking about it, whether or not they know it is occurring.

modes.name: Dragon-Blooded
modes.title: Thrashing Carp Serenade
modes.effect: The Exalt may activate this Charm when Hearthmates or loyal agents engage in sabotage in her stead.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Gnawing Mouse Malaise
modes.effect: Commit 1 mote while sabotaging an organization the Exalt or a shape holds authority in. All its ventures are +2 difficulty until the story’s end or commitment ends.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Haunted Official’s Psychodrama
modes.effect: Anyone with a Virtue or Intimacy that matches the Liminal’s emotion automatically fails a roll to overcome an obstacle. Others may attempt the roll if unaffected.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Paralyzed Committee Infliction
modes.effect: Commit 1 mote for the story. Declare a target group without sabotage. All their ventures are affected. May be contested with appropriate magic.

modes.name: Abyssal
modes.title: Despair-Inducing Failure
modes.effect: Commit 1 mote for the story. Increases difficulty of the group’s ventures by two. If sabotage is revealed, the effect ends. Officials involved die when failing and their ghosts haunt the site.

name: DEFT OFFICIAL’S WAY
description: The Exalt storms the labyrinthine halls of bureaucracy, cleaving through impediments. Spend 1 mote while navigating. Choose one effect: make an extra venture roll once per session; reduce a venture’s difficulty by one; or ignore cutting corners consequences once per venture.

modes.name: Getimian
modes.title: Another Life’s Lessons
modes.effect: Spend an additional mote. May add any number of common advantages to the roll, up to two successes.

name: ILLIMITABLE MASTER FENCE
description: The Exalt assesses economic activity and inserts herself into local trade. During a dramatic scene observing economic activity, spend 1 mote to ask a question. Additional questions cost 1 mote each.

name: JADE LEAVES A TRAIL
description: The Exalt senses powerful actors behind scenes, tracing finances and favors. During investigation, spend 1 mote to ask questions about affiliations, deception, beneficiaries, suspicious wealth, debts, or hidden ledgers.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Blood Money Method
modes.effect: Ask whether the target’s wealth comes from crime, violence, or murder.

name: MOTIVE-DISCERNING TECHNIQUE
description: The Exalt reads her target’s motives and feelings. During interaction, spend 1 mote to ask one of several questions about emotions, Virtues, Intimacies, hidden factors, or influence methods.

modes.name: Dragon-Blooded
modes.title: Blood-to-Blood Intuition
modes.effect: May ask: How are the character and I related?

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Scent of Regret
modes.effect: May ask: What lingering regrets does the character hold?

name: THE PERFECT BARGAIN
description: The Exalt is a master of negotiation. Commit 1 mote for the duration of negotiations. While bartering or discussing trade, the difficulty of social rolls cannot exceed 5.

name: THE PERFECT PRICE
description: The Exalt intuits what an item is worth to someone else. She automatically knows what a target would want in exchange or what they'd give for something. Gains 1 bonus success when leveraging this information.

name: SECOND CHANCE APPROACH
description: The Exalt recovers a soured social interaction. Commit 1 mote for the scene. Reduce difficulty of social rolls against characters with negative Intimacies toward her by two. Double 9s on rolls to create positive Intimacies.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Ally to Life Acknowledgement
modes.effect: May apply benefits to people with negative Intimacies toward the undead.

name: STRANGE TONGUE UNDERSTANDING
description: The Exalt understands unfamiliar languages. Commit 1 mote for the scene. Can comprehend simple speech. Complex interaction or text requires a roll. Difficulty of being influenced in that language increases by 2.

modes.name: Solar
modes.title: Mingled Tongue Technique
modes.effect: Both characters understand each other as if speaking the same language.

modes.name: Abyssal
modes.title: Infinite Blasphemy Glossolalia
modes.effect: The Exalt can converse with any creature of darkness as if they shared a language.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Blue Vervain Binding
modes.effect: The Exalt may activate this Charm on behalf of someone else, granting them understanding.

modes.name: Infernal
modes.title: Unshattered Pillar’s Perfection
modes.effect: The Infernal speaks an ancient language all understand, but it cannot inspire or draw on positive Intimacies.
